== Arlwad (602833) ==
      
Arlwad is a village in the [[Haliyal ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 208.09 hectares and harbouring 481 households with total population of 2148 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[HALIYAL]] is at a distance of 14 km. Male population is 1047 and female population is 1101. Scheduled Caste Population is 31 and Scheduled Tribes population is 119. Census Location Code of the village is 602833<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
